name: Saint Bernardino of Siena
description: Saint Bernardino of Siena; Taddeo Crivelli (Italian, died about 1479, active about 1451 - 1479); Ferrara, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; about 1469; Tempera colors, gold paint, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 10.8 x 7.9 cm (4 1/4 x 3 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 13, fol. 195v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Saint Bernardino of Siena
medium: Tempera colors, gold paint, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
